description:
Keep your core cozy with this streamlined tunic. Made from a light bluesign approved nylon blend, the Cangur tunic blocks the wind and helps you hold onto your hard earned warmth.

  • Made of nylon and spandex stretch taffeta that's wicking and wind resistant
  • High collar keeps chilly winds from creeping in
  • Toggle adjustment at the neck lets you seal the cozy in
  • Kangaroo pocket with snaps to secure items
  • Adjustable silhouette via a toggle adjustment at the waist
  • Dropped hem provides more coverage
name: Indyeva Cangur Tunic - Women's
